mapper.select: select a.*,b.title as 'goods.title' from tbl_shop_cart as a left join tbl_goods as b on a.goods_id = b.id where a.member_id = #{memberId} order by a.id desc
mapper.update: update tbl_shop_cart set num = #{num} where id = #{id}} and member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_shop_cart where id = #{id} and member_id = #{memberId}
